hero.DESCRIPTION: Experience the authentic flavors of premium spices, carefully selected and processed to preserve their natural essence.
hero.desc: We are always present on Instagram to show everything new and we are present on WhatsApp to answer inquiries

collectProduct.TITLE: Ready for global export
collectProduct.DESCRIPTION: We are ready to export to any country in the world and we have more than 250 items ready and prepared for export

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Saad Al Khair Foodstuff Retail Company is a Kuwaiti company with extensive experience in spices, legumes, herbs, nuts, natural oils, and food products. We are distinguished by our professional packaging that preserves product quality for long periods. We are committed to high quality to suit all tastes, and we sell our products wholesale, semi-wholesale, and retail.

CARDS.TITLE: All Types of Spices
CARDS.TEXT: We offer over 300 varieties of high-quality spices, herbs, legumes and natural oils imported from the best regions around the world.

CARDS.TITLE: Premium Quality
CARDS.TEXT: Our products undergo strict quality checks to ensure the finest taste and health standards.

CARDS.TITLE: Seasons Trusted Brand
CARDS.TEXT: Years of customer satisfaction and trust have made us a reliable name in the spice market.

OUR_PRODUCTS.TITLE: Our Products
OUR_PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Discover our premium selection of spices and blends, carefully sourced and processed to ensure the highest quality.

products.title: Meat and vegetable soup
products.description: A balanced blend of Arabic flavors, including a variety of soups.

products.title: Coriander Seeds
products.description: Delicious aroma and distinctive taste. Available in packages: 100g, 250g, 500g, and 1kg

products.title: Dried roses
products.description: Natural dried rose with a fragrant scent, ideal for decoration or use in herbalism.

products.title: Ginger powder
products.description: Helps boost immunity and digestion Used in cooking and hot drinks

products.title: Cardamom Medium
products.description: Strong flavor and aroma Ideal for Arabic coffee, cooking, and desserts

products.title: Crushed biryani spices
products.description: A premium blend of authentic spices Grounded and ready for immediate use

WHAT_US.TITLE: What Distinguishes Us
WHAT_US.DESCRIPTION: We pride ourselves on our commitment to quality and traditional methods that preserve the authentic flavor of our spices.

product.title: Steam Washing Spices
product.description: Our spices undergo a meticulous steam washing process to remove impurities while preserving their natural flavor and aroma.

product.title: Manual Roasting for Flavor
product.description: We roast our spices by hand using traditional methods to enhance their flavors and aromatic profiles.

product.title: Product Grinding First
product.description: Our spices are ground immediately after roasting to capture their peak flavor and aroma.

product.title: Various Package Sizes
product.description: We offer over 300 varieties of our products in a range of packaging sizes to meet different customer needs and preferences, ranging from 100 grams to 1000 grams, depending on the consumer's preference.

product.title: High Quality Standards
product.description: We maintain strict quality control and hygiene standards throughout our production process.

product.title: Passion for Tradition
product.description: We are passionate about preserving traditional spice preparation methods that have been passed down through generations.

CUSTOMER_REVIEWS.TITLE: Customer Reviews
CUSTOMER_REVIEWS.DESCRIPTION: Hear what our customers have to say about their experience with our products.

product.description: The quality of Saad Al Khair spices is exceptional. Their kabsa mix has changed the way I cook, adding authentic Middle Eastern flavors to my kitchen. I highly recommend it!
product.name: Mohammed Al-Harbi

product.description: As a restaurant owner, I've tried many spice suppliers, but Saad Al Khair stands out for its consistency and unparalleled freshness. Their steam-washed spices have a pure, clean flavor that my customers notice and appreciate.
product.name: Fatima Al-Qasimi

product.description: The packaging is excellent and keeps the spices fresh for a long time. I appreciate the different size options available. Their turmeric is the most vibrant I've ever tasted!
product.name: Ahmad Nasser

CONTACT_US.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT_US.DESCRIPTION: Hear what our customers have to say about their experience with our products.
